input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Tie Bar"
Reference Product Name: "Men's Polo Shirt"
Reference Product Description:
Discover the perfect blend of comfort, quality, and style with our men's knit polos collection.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Sunspel Men's Riviera Long Sleeve Polo'
  - Name='Cutter & Buck Pike Eco Flora Print Mens Polo'
  - Name='Members Only Men's Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Tommy Bahama Men's Positano Palms Five O' Clock IslandZone Piqué Polo'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Fit Long Sleeve Cotton Piqué Polo'
  - Name='TravisMathew Men's Line of Play Golf Polo'
  - Name='Reflo Bohai Performance Polo'
  - Name='Cutter & Buck Forge Eco Stretch Recycled Mens Polo'
  - Name='Johnnie-O Men's Hex Print Performance Jersey Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Heathered Cotton Piqué Polo'
  - Name='Polo Ralph Lauren Men's Classic Fit Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Ralph Lauren Men's Classic Fit Polo Bear Mesh Polo Shirt'
  - Name='The Normal Brand Performance Pique Polo'
  - Name='Boss Men's Polston Tipped Zip Polo'
  - Name='Bradley Stripe Sankaty Polo Vineyard Vines Men's'
  - Name='Antigua Men's Washington-St. Louis Spark Polo'
  - Name='Lands' End Men's Long Sleeve Interlock Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Lands' End Men's School Uniform Long Sleeve Interlock Polo Shirt'
  - Name='UV Skinz Long Sleeve Performance Polo'
  - Name='Harbor Bay by DXL Men's Big & Tall Pocket Piqué Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Zegna Men's Premium Cotton Polo Sweater'
  - Name='Polo Ralph Lauren Men's Classic-Fit Hibiscus Mesh Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Rag & Bone Men's Pima Cotton Polo Shirt'
  - Name='scotch & Soda Men's Structured Knit Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Robert Graham Men's The Player Polo'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sunspel Men's Riviera Long Sleeve Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic men's knit polo, with the only difference being long sleeves. Still highly relevant in terms of function, construction, and target audience.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Cutter & Buck Pike Eco Flora Print Mens Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A standard men's polo shirt—knit, same core function, purpose, and silhouette. Print does not affect relevancy per guidelines.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Members Only Men's Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Directly matches product type: a classic men's polo shirt in knit fabric intended for comfort and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tommy Bahama Men's Positano Palms Five O' Clock IslandZone Piqué Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men’s knit piqué polo shirt—matches product type, construction, and audience.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Fit Long Sleeve Cotton Piqué Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic men's knit polo in piqué cotton, with long sleeves as the only notable difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: TravisMathew Men's Line of Play Golf Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance/golf polo, but functionally, structurally, and by audience, it is highly relevant to standard men's polos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Reflo Bohai Performance Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's performance polo; knit style, same purpose/usage—very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Cutter & Buck Forge Eco Stretch Recycled Mens Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's knit polo shirt, functionally equivalent to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Johnnie-O Men's Hex Print Performance Jersey Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's knit performance polo—directly in line with reference item.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Heathered Cotton Piqué Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic men's knit cotton piqué polo—a direct match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Polo Ralph Lauren Men's Classic Fit Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: One of the standard bearers for men's knit polos—identical in type, features, and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ralph Lauren Men's Classic Fit Polo Bear Mesh Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic men's mesh polo shirt with only a motif for distinction—otherwise functionally identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Normal Brand Performance Pique Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's performance pique polo—matches the type closely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Boss Men's Polston Tipped Zip Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Knit polo shirt with a zip instead of buttons—minor difference but otherwise same construction and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bradley Stripe Sankaty Polo Vineyard Vines Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Standard men's knit polo shirt with stripe detail—fully relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lands' End Men's Long Sleeve Interlock Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's long sleeve polo—slight variation in sleeve length but otherwise highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve variation designed for uniforms, otherwise matches key features.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic men's piqué polo (big & tall fit with pocket is a minor difference). Core silhouette and construction remain unchanged.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Zegna Men's Premium Cotton Polo Sweater
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Polo sweater has a knit collar/button placket, but usually with a sweater gauge and fit, so still relevant but less so than standard polos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Polo Ralph Lauren Men's Classic-Fit Hibiscus Mesh Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit men's mesh polo; decoration does not affect core construction or use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rag & Bone Men's Pima Cotton Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Knit men's polo shirt in premium cotton—matches the reference product completely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: scotch & Soda Men's Structured Knit Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's knit polo shirt with a structured fit—very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Robert Graham Men's The Player Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's polo shirt—directly aligned with the reference product in type and construction.
